alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 2:01AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG OVER MINNESOTA ARROWHEAD EARLY THIS MORNING... Patchy dense fog will affect portions of the Minnesota Arrowhead early this morning. Patchy areas of visibility of 1/4 mile or less are forecast. Visibilities are expected to improve by sunrise. A few locations which may experience patchy dense fog include Two Harbors, Isabella, Finland, Silver Bay, Gunflint Lake, Grand Marais, and Grand Portage. If traveling, reduce your speed and use low-beam headlights when encountering foggy areas. A Dense Fog Advisory may be needed. Keep updated on the latest forecast for fog development trends.
